Cloak Buff

The Cloak buff is a temporary status effect that grants invisibility in Remixed Dungeon.

Description

The Cloak buff makes the affected character invisible and harder to detect. It is applied by the Cloak Spell and Hide in Grass Spell.

Properties

  • Buff Type: Invisibility
  • Stealth Bonus: Caster's skill level + caster:lvl() / 4
  • Duration: Calculated as caster:skillLevel() * 5 turns
  • Status Effect: Character appears with invisible sprite

Mechanics

  • Provides significant stealth bonus during its duration
  • Makes the character invisible to enemies
  • The buff automatically ends at the beginning of each turn (due to the act function in Cloak.lua)
  • Character sprite changes to show invisible status

Applications

  • Allows for temporary escape from dangerous situations
  • Enables stealthy movement without detection
  • Provides tactical advantages during combat

Source Code Reference

  • Cloak.lua (buff implementation)
